member.name: T:MARS.Shuttle.SimulationConfig.AtConstructorInfo
member.summary:
This class reflects how agenttypes will be initailized via their constructors
during the simulation initialisation phase

member.summary: STD constructor

member.name: M:MARS.Shuttle.SimulationConfig.AtConstructorInfo.SetClassName(System.String)
member.summary: Set the class name of the agenttype to initialize
member.param: name of the agenttype to initialize

member.name: M:MARS.Shuttle.SimulationConfig.AtConstructorInfo.AddFieldToContructorArgumentRelation(MARS.Shuttle.SimulationConfig.AtConstructorParameter)
member.summary:
Add initialisation info for one agenttype constructor
parameter to the parameterInfoList
member.param: initialisation info for this constructor parameter

member.name: M:MARS.Shuttle.SimulationConfig.AtConstructorInfo.GetClassName
member.summary: Get the class name of the agenttype to initialize
member.returns: class name of the agenttype to initialize

member.name: M:MARS.Shuttle.SimulationConfig.AtConstructorInfo.GetFieldToConstructorArgumentRelations
member.summary:
Get the list of initialisation infos for each constructor
parameter type in the correct order
member.returns:
list of initialisation infos for each constructor
parameter type in the correct order

member.name: T:MARS.Shuttle.SimulationConfig.AtConstructorParameter
member.summary:
This class represents the initialisation info of one
agenttype constructor parameter. this info can either be how to initialize the parameter via a
data field (or column) from a MARS subcube
or
how to initialize the parameter via a fixed parameter (constant value)

member.name: M:MARS.Shuttle.SimulationConfig.AtConstructorParameter.#ctor(MARS.Shuttle.SimulationConfig.AtConstructorParameter.FieldToConstructorArgumentRelation)
member.summary:
Use this constructor if the parameter init type is
MarsCubeFieldToConstructorArgumentRelation
member.param: struct representing the expexted initialisation info

member.name: M:MARS.Shuttle.SimulationConfig.AtConstructorParameter.#ctor(MARS.Shuttle.SimulationConfig.AtConstructorParameter.ConstantParameterToConstructorArgumentRelation)
member.summary:
Use this constructor if the parameter init type is
ConstantParameterToConstructorArgumentRelation
member.param: struct representing the expexted initialisation info

member.name: M:MARS.Shuttle.SimulationConfig.AtConstructorParameter.GetParameterType
member.summary:
Get the type of the initialisation info used for this
constructor parameter
member.returns:
type of the initialisation info used for this
constructor parameter

member.name: M:MARS.Shuttle.SimulationConfig.AtConstructorParameter.GetFieldToConstructorArgumentRelation
member.summary:
Get initialisation info used for this
constructor parameter, if the info parameter type
is MarsCubeFieldToConstructorArgumentRelation
member.returns:
info parameter of type MarsCubeFieldToConstructorArgumentRelation
ATTENTION: returns null, if GetParameterType() does not return info type
MarsCubeFieldToConstructorArgumentRelation

member.name: M:MARS.Shuttle.SimulationConfig.AtConstructorParameter.GetConstantParameterToConstructorArgumentRelation
member.summary:
Get initialisation info used for this
constructor parameter, if the info parameter type
is ConstantParameterToConstructorArgumentRelation
member.returns:
info parameter of type ConstantParameterToConstructorArgumentRelation
ATTENTION: returns null, if GetParameterType() does not return info type
ConstantParameterToConstructorArgumentRelation

member.summary:
Indicates the type of initialisation info used
for this constructor parameter

member.name: T:MARS.Shuttle.SimulationConfig.PublishInShuttleAttribute
member.summary:
use this attribute to mark an AgentType constructor for
publishing its arguments in MARS Websuites scenario configuration.
the containing class must implement the interface IAgent
ATTENTION: for now it's just possible to mark only one constructor per
AgentType class
